ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription:
Identify the property of real numbers illustrated here: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>87.4</mn>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>0</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>87.4</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">87.4 + 0 = 87.4</annotation></semantics></math>.
